flawed_nl_solution:
The milk cost $4 but was on sale for 1/2 off so 4*0.5 = $<<4*0.5=2>>2
She bought 2 pounds of bananas at $0.75 per pound so 2 *.0.75 = $<<2*0.75=1.5>>1.5
She had a $1.25 coupon off of laundry detergent so 10.25 - 1.25 = $<<10.25-1.25=8>>8
When you add all of her purchases together then 2 + 1.5 +3.5 + 8 = $<<2+1.5+3.5+8=15>>15
She paid with a $20 bill so 20-15 = $<<20-15=5>>5 left over
